Package client.view

Class ClientTUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.view.ClientTUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ClientTUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class that represents the Textual User Interface (TUI) for the client. It provides the client with options to interact with a server.

      • ClientTUI

        public ClientTUI​(java.io.Reader clientReader,
                 java.io.Reader serverReader,
                 Protocol protocol,
                 java.lang.String playerName,
                 java.lang.String playerType)
        Creates a new instance of the ClientTUI.
        Parameters:
        clientReader - Reader for the client input.
        serverReader - Reader for the server input.
        protocol - The protocol to communicate with the server.
        playerName - The name of the player.
        playerType - Type of the player (AI or Human).

        public static java.lang.String getPlayerType​(java.io.BufferedReader clientInput)
        Gets the player type.
        Parameters:
